author: gottfriedherold
content:
Hi, we (Dankrad Feist, Gottfried Herold, Mark Simkin, Benedikt Wagner) recently worked on networking solutions for data availability sampling and put out a preprint on https://arxiv.org/abs/2504.13757 for a distributed data structure that works with very low honesty assumptions (and that actually has security proof).
See e.g. https://ethresear.ch/t/robust-distributed-arrays-probably-secure-networking-for-das/22328
I will give a talk about our construction next Monday, 26th May, 13:30 -- 14:30 CEST in our cryptography seminar about the construction. Maybe some people here are interested.
Pinging <@194432762315407360> in particular, as we had some discussions about this in the past.
